md:
giải nghĩa từ "washed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Washed (verb) - rửa, giặt
	+ Meaning: to clean something with water or a liquid.
	+ Example: She washed her hands before eating.
	+ Related words: wash, washing, washer, clean, rinse.

* Washed (adjective) - đã được rửa, đã được giặt
	+ Meaning: cleaned or purified by washing.
	+ Example: The washed clothes were hung out to dry.
	+ Related words: clean, fresh, pure, spotless.

* Washed (verb) - bị rửa trôi, bị cuốn trôi
	+ Meaning: to be carried away or removed by water or a liquid.
	+ Example: The sandcastle was washed away by the tide.
	+ Related words: erode, sweep, carry, remove.

* Washed (adjective) - đã được rửa sạch, đã được tẩy sạch
	+ Meaning: freed from impurities or imperfections.
	+ Example: The washed soul felt reborn.
	+ Related words: pure, clean, innocent, guiltless.

* Washed (verb) - đã được rửa sạch, đã được tẩy sạch
	+ Meaning: to remove impurities or imperfections from something.
	+ Example: The priest washed the sins away.
	+ Related words: cleanse, purify, absolve, redeem.

Note: The meanings and examples provided are not exhaustive, and the word "washed" can have other meanings and uses depending on the context.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "washed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Washed (verb) - rửa, giặt

    • Meaning: to clean something with water or a liquid.
    • Example: She washed her hands before eating.
    • Related words: wash, washing, washer, clean, rinse.

  • Washed (adjective) - đã được rửa, đã được giặt

    • Meaning: cleaned or purified by washing.
    • Example: The washed clothes were hung out to dry.
    • Related words: clean, fresh, pure, spotless.

  • Washed (verb) - bị rửa trôi, bị cuốn trôi

    • Meaning: to be carried away or removed by water or a liquid.
    • Example: The sandcastle was washed away by the tide.
    • Related words: erode, sweep, carry, remove.

  • Washed (adjective) - đã được rửa sạch, đã được tẩy sạch

    • Meaning: freed from impurities or imperfections.
    • Example: The washed soul felt reborn.
    • Related words: pure, clean, innocent, guiltless.

  • Washed (verb) - đã được rửa sạch, đã được tẩy sạch

    • Meaning: to remove impurities or imperfections from something.
    • Example: The priest washed the sins away.
    • Related words: cleanse, purify, absolve, redeem.

Note: The meanings and examples provided are not exhaustive, and the word "washed" can have other meanings and uses depending on the context.
